30 import rospy
31 
32 from sensor_msgs.msg import Joy
33 
34 
35 class ButtonTransition(object):
36  """
37  Monitor button transitions.
38 
39  The transition is measured when read.
40  """
41  def __init__(self, val_func, down_val=True, up_val=False):
42  self._raw_value = val_func
43  self._down_val = down_val
44  self._up_val = up_val
45  self._up_checked = True
46  self._down_checked = False
47 
48  def down(self):
49  val = self._raw_value()
50  if val == self._down_val:
51  if not self._down_checked:
52  self._down_checked = True
53  return True
54  else:
55  self._down_checked = False
56  return False
57 
58  def up(self):
59  val = self._raw_value()
60  if val == self._up_val:
61  if not self._up_checked:
62  self._up_checked = True
63  return True
64  else:
65  self._up_checked = False
66  return False
67 
68 
69 class StickTransition(object):
70  """
71  Monitor transitions in stick movement.
72 
73  The transition is measured when read.
74  """
75  def __init__(self, val_func, epsilon=0.05):
76  self._raw_value = val_func
77  self._epsilon = epsilon
78  self._value = 0.0
79 
80  def value(self):
81  self.changed()
82  return self._value
83 
84  def changed(self):
85  value = self._raw_value()
86  if abs(value - self._value) > self._epsilon:
87  self._value = value
88  return True
89  return False
90 
91  def increased(self):
92  value = self._raw_value()
93  if (value - self._value) > self._epsilon:
94  self._value = value
95  return True
96  return False
97 
98  def decreased(self):
99  value = self._raw_value()
100  if (self._value - value) > self._epsilon:
101  self._value = value
102  return True
103  return False
104 
105 
106 class Joystick(object):
107  """
108  Abstract base class to handle joystick input.
109  """
110 
111  def __init__(self, scale=1.0, offset=0.0, deadband=0.1):
112  """
113  Maps joystick input to robot control.
114 
115  @type scale: float
116  @param scale: scaling applied to joystick values [1.0]
117  @type offset: float
118  @param offset: joystick offset values, post-scaling [0.0]
119  @type deadband: float
120  @param deadband: deadband post scaling and offset [0.1]
121 
122  Raw joystick valuess are in [1.0...-1.0].
123  """
124  sub = rospy.Subscriber("/joy", Joy, self._on_joy)
125  self._scale = scale
126  self._offset = offset
127  self._deadband = deadband
128  self._controls = {}
129 
130  self._buttons = {}
131  self._sticks = {}
132  button_names = (
133  'btnLeft', 'btnUp', 'btnDown', 'btnRight',
134  'dPadUp', 'dPadDown', 'dPadLeft', 'dPadRight',
135  'leftBumper', 'rightBumper',
136  'leftTrigger', 'rightTrigger',
137  'function1', 'function2')
138  stick_names = (
139  'leftStickHorz', 'leftStickVert',
140  'rightStickHorz', 'rightStickVert')
141 
142  #doing this with lambda won't work
143  def gen_val_func(name, type_name):
144  def val_func():
145  return type_name(
146  name in self._controls and self._controls[name])
147  return val_func
148 
149  for name in button_names:
150  self._buttons[name] = ButtonTransition(gen_val_func(name, bool))
151  for name in stick_names:
152  self._sticks[name] = StickTransition(gen_val_func(name, float))
153 
154  def _on_joy(self, msg):
155  """ callback for messages from joystick input
156  Args:
157  msg(Joy): a joystick input message
158  """
159  raise NotImplementedError()
160 
161  def button_up(self, name):
162  return self._buttons[name].up()
163 
164  def button_down(self, name):
165  return self._buttons[name].down()
166 
167  def stick_changed(self, name):
168  return self._sticks[name].changed()
169 
170  def stick_inc(self, name):
171  return self._sticks[name].increased()
172 
173  def stick_dec(self, name):
174  return self._sticks[name].decreased()
175 
176  def stick_value(self, name):
177  """
178  Returns:
179  the deadbanded, scaled and offset value of the axis
180  """
181  value = self._sticks[name].value()
182  if value > self._deadband or value < -self._deadband:
183  return (value * self._scale) + self._offset
184  return 0
185 
186 
187 class XboxController(Joystick):
188  """
189  Xbox specialization of Joystick.
190  """
191  def __init__(self, scale=1.0, offset=0.0, deadband=0.5):
192  super(XboxController, self).__init__(scale, offset, deadband)
193 
194  def _on_joy(self, msg):
195  """ callback for messages from joystick input
196  Args:
197  msg(Joy): a joystick input message
198  """
199 
200  self._controls['btnLeft'] = (msg.buttons[2] == 1)
201  self._controls['btnUp'] = (msg.buttons[3] == 1)
202  self._controls['btnDown'] = (msg.buttons[0] == 1)
203  self._controls['btnRight'] = (msg.buttons[1] == 1)
204 
205  self._controls['dPadUp'] = (msg.axes[7] > 0.5)
206  self._controls['dPadDown'] = (msg.axes[7] < -0.5)
207  self._controls['dPadLeft'] = (msg.axes[6] > 0.5)
208  self._controls['dPadRight'] = (msg.axes[6] < -0.5)
209 
210  self._controls['leftStickHorz'] = msg.axes[0]
211  self._controls['leftStickVert'] = msg.axes[1]
212  self._controls['rightStickHorz'] = msg.axes[3]
213  self._controls['rightStickVert'] = msg.axes[4]
214 
215  self._controls['leftBumper'] = (msg.buttons[4] == 1)
216  self._controls['rightBumper'] = (msg.buttons[5] == 1)
217  self._controls['leftTrigger'] = (msg.axes[2] < 0.0)
218  self._controls['rightTrigger'] = (msg.axes[5] < 0.0)
219 
220  self._controls['function1'] = (msg.buttons[6] == 1)
221  self._controls['function2'] = (msg.buttons[10] == 1)
222 
223

238  self._controls['btnDown'] = (msg.buttons[0] == 1)
239  self._controls['btnRight'] = (msg.buttons[1] == 1)

253  self._controls['leftTrigger'] = (msg.axes[2] < 0.0)
254  self._controls['rightTrigger'] = (msg.axes[5] < 0.0)
255

257  self._controls['function2'] = (msg.buttons[7] == 1)

259 class PS3Controller(Joystick):
260  """
261  PS3 specialization of Joystick.
262  """
263  def __init__(self, scale=1.0, offset=0.0, deadband=0.1):
264  super(PS3Controller, self).__init__(scale, offset, deadband)
265 
266  def _on_joy(self, msg):
267  """ callback for messages from joystick input
268  Args:
269  msg(Joy): a joystick input message
270  """
271 
272  self._controls['btnLeft'] = (msg.buttons[15] == 1)
273  self._controls['btnUp'] = (msg.buttons[12] == 1)
274  self._controls['btnDown'] = (msg.buttons[14] == 1)
275  self._controls['btnRight'] = (msg.buttons[13] == 1)
276 
277  self._controls['dPadUp'] = (msg.buttons[4] == 1)
278  self._controls['dPadDown'] = (msg.buttons[6] == 1)
279  self._controls['dPadLeft'] = (msg.buttons[7] == 1)
280  self._controls['dPadRight'] = (msg.buttons[5] == 1)
281 
282  self._controls['leftStickHorz'] = msg.axes[0]
283  self._controls['leftStickVert'] = msg.axes[1]
284  self._controls['rightStickHorz'] = msg.axes[2]
285  self._controls['rightStickVert'] = msg.axes[3]
286 
287  self._controls['leftBumper'] = (msg.buttons[10] == 1)
288  self._controls['rightBumper'] = (msg.buttons[11] == 1)
289  self._controls['leftTrigger'] = (msg.buttons[8] == 1)
290  self._controls['rightTrigger'] = (msg.buttons[9] == 1)
291 
292  self._controls['function1'] = (msg.buttons[0] == 1)
293  self._controls['function2'] = (msg.buttons[3] == 1)
